title: Harvard Theological Studies
additional-notes: The earliest active renewal shown here was filed under Books.  We have found no renewals filed under Periodicals.

This is a monographic series (with some of its issues also published as special numbers of the Harvard Theological Review).  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial beyond the first renewal noted here.
